3: you will be able to do justice
24: And (prohibited are) the ones who are married
49: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
53: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
68: And We would have guided them
77: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
90: surely He (would have) given them power
and surely they (would have) fought you
119: And I will surely mislead them
and surely arouse desires in them
and surely I will order them
so they will surely cut off
and surely I will order them
124: (even as much as) the speck on a date-seed
127: and the ones who are weak
172: the ones who are near (to Allah)
173: then He will give them in full
